_sText:
prisonisland complete was being played the whole day on the server that i use to play on,
but there was a glitch that allowed the people to "leave" from the map

so i decided to fix it and as i was going to edit it anyway i decided to improve the map

the improvements are:

-changed the trigger hurts in the water for trigger pushes to look like a flow
-added an island where the people that are caught in the flow are pulled to die
-added a weapon that make the player become a shark that can swim against the flow and 
walk faster on the ground
-added lights to the map
-removed the lock of the hospital(people hated that)
-removed the secret of the kitchen(dont no if i can call that improvement but i did it)
-added support for 48 players
-other small things that i dont remember now xD

and i tried to keep the same gameplay so i think you wont feel any big diference

ps. sry authors for editing the map without permission ><
pss. sry for the bad english.. im brazilian
